events.message: The policyholder reported a car accident involving their vehicle hitting a tree on a rainy day.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident based on the provided descriptions of collision and damage.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the auto accident case promptly.
The customer was contacted to acknowledge receipt of the claim and inform about next steps.
Request sent to the customer for accident report, photos of the damaged car, and repair estimates.
The customer submitted all requested documents including police report, vehicle photos, and billing statements.
Investigation was initiated to assess liability and verify the extent of damage to the vehicle.
Investigation concluded that the accident was caused by slippery road conditions and no third party was involved.
A settlement offer was proposed to the insured for covering the vehicle repair costs and related expenses.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the timely responses and the proposed settlement amount.
The claim was officially approved following customer acceptance of the settlement terms.
The payment for the approved claim amount was processed and disbursed to the customer's bank account.
The claim has been successfully closed after full settlement and payment issuance.
The final documents and claim records were archived in the system for future reference and compliance.
